      • fetchIdAssertions

        public java.util.List<IdAssertionMessageTo> fetchIdAssertions()
        Description copied from interface: UcFetchIdAssertions
        Fetches committed transactions cached in the adapter and clears the cache. Furthermore, the current application state, i.e. current block height is saved.
        Specified by:
        fetchIdAssertions in interface UcFetchIdAssertions
        Returns:
        a list of cached identity assertions
